topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53cb179d63687204051c0000#post_53cb179d63687204051c0000
It was such a sweet movie.


For those of you confused what movie I'm talking about the movie is about a woman who finds out her boyfriend is a werewolf and marries him regardless and raises their children.  It's pretty much the anti-twilight in that the characters have emotions and the characters develop relationship wise and all together seem like actual people.
